clinical_history: Assessment for renal calculus or hydronephrosis.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Common bile duct measures 23.14 mm, within normal limits.
Prostate is homogeneous; volume approximately 8.34 cc.
Breast tissue shows hypoechoic lesion measuring 6.95 mm.
Thyroid gland shows ill-defined echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Uterus appears coarse; endometrial thickness measures 39.54 mm.
